Template.description: The content of the email, composed of a subject line, an HTML part, and a text-only part

properties.description: The HTML body of the email.

properties.name: SubjectPart
properties.description: The subject line of the email.

properties.name: TextPart
properties.description: The email body that is visible to recipients whose email clients do not display HTML content.
